tika-vin05t23:5_0: ‘A monk who has five qualities shouldn’t give the full ordination, give formal support, or have a novice monk attend on him.
tika-vin05t23:5_1: He doesn’t both have and encourage others in the virtue,
tika-vin05t23:5_3: or wisdom of a fully trained,
tika-vin05t23:5_4: or freedom of one fully trained.
tika-vin05t23:5_5: or knowledge and vision of freedom of one fully trained.
tika-vin05t23:5_6: A monk who has these five qualities shouldn’t give the full ordination, give formal support, or have a novice monk attend on him.
tika-vin05t23:6_0: ‘A monk who has five qualities shouldn’t give the full ordination, give formal support, or have a novice monk attend on him.
tika-vin05t23:6_1: He has no faith, conscience, or moral prudence, and is lazy and absentminded.
tika-vin05t23:6_2: A monk who has these five qualities shouldn’t give the full ordination, give formal support, or have a novice monk attend on him.
tika-vin05t23:7_0: ‘A monk who has five qualities shouldn’t give the full ordination, give formal support, or have a novice monk attend on him.
tika-vin05t23:7_1: He has failed in the higher morality; he has failed in conduct; he has failed in view; he’s ignorant; he’s foolish; he’s witless.
tika-vin05t23:7_2: A monk who has these five qualities shouldn’t give the full ordination, give formal support, or have a novice monk attend on him.
tika-vin05t23:8_0: ‘A monk who has five qualities shouldn’t give the full ordination, give formal support, or have a novice monk attend on him.
tika-vin05t23:8_1: He’s not capable of three things in regard to a student: to nurse him or to have someone nurse him when he’s sick; to send him away or to have him sent away when he’s discontent with the spiritual life; and to use the Teaching to dispel anxiety. And he doesn’t know the offenses; and he doesn’t know how offenses are cleared.
tika-vin05t23:8_2: A monk who has these five qualities shouldn’t give the full ordination, give formal support, or have a novice monk attend on him.
tika-vin05t23:9_0: ‘A monk who has five qualities shouldn’t give the full ordination, give formal support, or have a novice monk attend on him.
tika-vin05t23:9_1: He’s not capable of five things in regard to a student: to make him train in good conduct; to train him in the basics of the spiritual life; to train him in the Teaching; to train him in the Monastic Law; to use the Teaching to make him give up wrong views.
tika-vin05t23:9_2: A monk who has these five qualities shouldn’t give the full ordination, give formal support, or have a novice monk attend on him.
